summary.body: It's gone. Around 12.45pm today a massive crane and hordes of men in fluorescent jackets finalized the deed. It's a sad day for the Barbican Estate and its residents. Also an unhappy portent of the shape of things to come PS Is it really "JP Morgan Chase Bear" now? Perhaps they have a sense of humour after all. Even better if it could emulate that immortal Shakespearean stage direction in the "The Winter's Tale":- [Exit pursued by a Bear] If only.........................
summary.subject: Silk Street Bridge - R.I.P.
